constituent: crystal, king, jewel, ball, sheik, top hat, villain, sheaf, shovel, belt, elbow
heisigStory: This kanji refers to one of the seven classical stones of China. Its elements: jewel . . . top hat . . . villain . . . belt . . . elbow.
koohiiStory1: Michael Jackson is the king of pop, wearing his crystal rhinestone glove (see detach (#1492).
koohiiStory2: In my story for detatch detach (#1492), the left side primitive was junkie. The top-hatted villian of society with a belt around their elbow. Here, the junkie is getting a fix of crystal meth: the jewel in the crown of today´s drugs.
